name: The Wounded Land, an Orcs Rising Stories
name_original: The Wounded Land, an Orcs Rising Stories
description:
The Wounded Land 

An Orcs Rising Stories

Welcome to 'Orcs Rising: The Wounded Land' - a free-to-play visual novel that takes you on an epic journey through a world of fantasy and adventure, where orcs are the heroes fighting for their freedom and equality against the oppression of humans and elves.

This game has been developed for joining game jams, and is a side project of the bigger long-term project 'Orcs Rising: Time Has Come'. It is also our first foray into the world of mid-fantasy, and we would be thrilled to receive feedback from players.

Featuring a variety of choices that affect the outcome of the story, 'The Wounded Land' allows you to navigate Guro's actions and choices in this immersive world. Choose wisely as you lead your group of orcs through treacherous terrain and hostile tribes.


Will you join the resistance against the humans and elves, leave the village to live a life of solitude, or seek revenge against those who have wronged you? The choice is yours.

This game is designed to be accessible and engaging for all levels of players, and we hope that you will enjoy your journey through 'The Wounded Land'.

Check the project behind !

Orcs Rising : Time Has Come ! -> A innovative RTS where you are leading orcs to meet their destiny ! 

https://benybens.itch.io/orcs-rising-time-has-come
